pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:0.5: 64. The second training rule on trainee nuns
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.2: At that time the nuns gave the full ordination to trainee nuns who had trained in the six rules for two years, but who had not been approved by the Sangha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.4: “Come, trainee nuns, find out about this,” “Give this,” “Bring this,” “There’s need for this,” “Make this allowable.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.6: “Venerables, we’re not trainee nuns; we’re nuns.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.7: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.8: “How can nuns give the full ordination to trainee nuns who have trained for two years in the six rules, but who haven’t been approved by the Sangha?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.9: “Is it true, monks, that nuns do this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.12: “… How can the nuns give the full ordination to trainee nuns who have trained for two years in the six rules, but who haven’t been approved by the Sangha?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.13: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it …” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.15: he gave a teaching and addressed the monks:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.16: “Monks, I allow giving approval for the full ordination of a trainee nun who has trained for two years in the six rules.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.17: And it should be given in this way.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.18: After approaching the Sangha of nuns, that trainee nun should put her upper robe over one shoulder and pay respect at the feet of the nuns. She should then squat on her heels, put the palms of her hands together, and say:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.19: ‘Venerables, I, the trainee nun so-and-so, who has trained for two years in the six rules under Venerable so-and-so, ask the Sangha for approval to be fully ordained.’
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.20: And she should ask a second
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.22: A competent and capable nun should then inform the Sangha:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.23: ‘Please, Venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.24: This trainee nun so-and-so, who has trained under Venerable so-and-so for two years in the six rules, is asking the Sangha for approval to be given the full ordination.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.25: If it seems appropriate to the Sangha, the Sangha should give approval for the trainee nun so-and-so, who has trained for two years in the six rules, to be given the full ordination.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.27: Please, Venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.28: This trainee nun so-and-so, who has trained under Venerable so-and-so for two years in the six rules, is asking the Sangha for approval to be given the full ordination.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.29: The Sangha gives approval for the trainee nun so-and-so, who has trained for two years in the six rules, to be given the full ordination.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.30: Any nun who approves of giving approval for the trainee nun so-and-so, who has trained for two years in the six rules, to be given the full ordination should remain silent.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.31: Any nun who does not approve should speak up.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.32: The Sangha has given approval for the trainee nun so-and-so, who has trained for two years in the six rules, to be given the full ordination.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.33: The Sangha approves and is therefore silent. I will remember it thus.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.34: Then, after rebuking those nuns in many ways for being difficult to support …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.35: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.36: ‘If a nun gives the full ordination to a trainee nun who has trained in the six rules for two years, but who has not been approved by the Sangha, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:2.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:2.8: who has trained in the six rules.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:2.10: approval to be given the full ordination has not been given though a legal procedure consisting of one motion and one announcement.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:2.13: If, intending to give the full ordination, she searches for a group, a teacher, a bowl, or a robe, or she establishes a boundary, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:2.14: After the motion, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:2.15: After each of the first two announcements, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:2.16: When the last announcement is finished, the preceptor commits an offense entailing confession;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:2.17: the group and the teacher commit an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:2.18: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, and she perceives it as legitimate, and she gives the full ordination, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:2.19: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, but she is unsure if it is, and she gives the full ordination, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:2.20: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, but she perceives it as illegitimate, and she gives the full ordination, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:2.21: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, but she perceives it as legitimate, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:2.22: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, but she is unsure if it is, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:2.23: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, and she perceives it as illegitimate, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:2.25: if she gives the full ordination to a trainee nun who has trained in the six rules for two years and who has been approved by the Sangha;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:2.27: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:2.28: The fourth training rule is finished.
